channel.title: How do i add a Starter Pack Selection Read
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys i want to make my server so when you log into the server
you can choose
pure - skiller - ranger
and you choose your option to receive gear
anyone know a tut or a small tut info to where to start [/b]

item.title: How do i add a Starter Pack Selection Read
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

There are plenty of tutorials on how to use dialogues. Most of them are for NPCs but theyâ€™re not hard to adapt.

item.title: How do i add a Starter Pack Selection Read
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

cammyPVPftw:

In client.java, under initialize, just make it send a simple dialogue and create a method in your packets to stop movement.

would you have a code for this mate??

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a Starter Pack Selection Read
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

In client.java, under initialize, just make it send a simple dialogue and create a method in your packets to stop movement.
